title: Remove shoe names and add 7 more product images

requirements.summary: Remove shoe name text from all shoe cards while keeping images visible
acceptanceCriteria: Shoe cards display only images without any product name text
Card layout and styling remain consistent with current luxury design
Hover effects and other card interactions continue to work

file_operations.description: Remove the shoe name text (e.g., 'Adidas Ultraboost', 'Nike Air Max') from each shoe card while preserving the image display, card structure, hover effects, and luxury styling with gold accents

requirements.summary: Add 7 additional men's branded shoe product images to the gallery
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays a total of 12 shoe images (5 existing + 7 new)
New shoe images feature various men's branded footwear styles
2-column grid layout adapts to accommodate all 12 images
All images maintain consistent styling and hover effects

file_operations.description: Add 7 new shoe entries to the shoes array, referencing the generated images: frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-6.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-7.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-8.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-9.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-10.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-11.dim_800x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/shoe-12.dim_800x800.png. Ensure the 2-column grid layout accommodates all 12 images with consistent styling and hover effects matching the existing luxury design
